buy_coupon_ok: We have registered your order and we confirm that we have received your payment for a total amount of 149 euros.
buy_coupon_text: You will receive in a second e-mail your gift card with the promotional code to activate your subscription on Blacknut. You can print this gift card to offer it to someone.
buy_coupon_text2: If you do not receive the email containing your gift card, please check the Spam folder of your mailbox. If the problem persists, please contact the support.
buy_coupon_thanks: The Blacknut team thank you for your order and wish you happy christmas holidays.
error_amazon_account_already_used: This Amazon account is already used.
error_coupon_already_active: There is already an active coupon for this account.
error_credit_card_already_used: This credit card has already been used.
error_email_already_used: This email address is already used for a Blacknut account.
error_feedback_invalid: StreamID is required / Ratings are required
error_invalid_subscription: You must have a valid subscription
error_locked_access: Your account is blocked. Please, reset your password to unlock it.
error_obsolete_api_detail: Your API version {{.CurVersion}} is obsolete. Minimum accepted is {{.MinVersion}}.
error_other_subscription: Trying to update an Amazon subscription on Stripe user
error_subscription_already_active: You already have an active subscription.
error_tip_already_skipped: This tip has already been skipped for this user
error_unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
error_update_speedtest: Can not update an existing speedtest
gift_card_text_code: Code usable only once for any Blacknut account creation
gift_card_text_desc: Discover our catalog of fascinating videogames & play in 1 click wherever you are!
gift_card_text_intro: Gift card for a one-year subscription to Blacknut
legal: You received this mail because you registered on
